comment: WasteWaterTreatment - Junction adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WasteWater/master/WasteWaterJunction/schema.json
description: This entity contains an harmonised description of a generic Junction made for the Wastewater treatment domain. Junctions could be in place in certain sections of thetreatment plant. In wastewater treatment purposes, the junction is most useful if it is a locationof a sensor that measures a specific variable.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bod
contents.comment: Biological Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the influent or effluent.

contents.name: cod
contents.comment: Chemical Oxygen Demand concentration measured in the influent or effluent.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: do
contents.comment: Dissolved Oxygen concentration measured in wastewater.

contents.name: emissionFlow
contents.comment: Gas emission flow volume measured at a junction prior to being emitted in an off-gas stack.

contents.name: endsAt
contents.comment: A relationship indicating the entity the junction is connected to in the downstream point

contents.name: flowrate
contents.comment: Flowrate of wastewater.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nh4
contents.comment: Ammonium concentration measured in a tank.

contents.name: no3
contents.comment: Nitrate concentration measured in wastewater.

contents.name: pH
contents.comment: Water pH level measured.

contents.name: po4
contents.comment: Ortho-phosphate concentration measured in wastewater.

contents.name: pressure
contents.comment: Pressure measured at given location. Most relevant for airflow as provided by blowers to wastewater tanks

contents.name: redox
contents.comment: Redox level measured in wastewater.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: startsAt
contents.comment: A relationship indicating the entity the junction is connected to in the upstream point

contents.name: temperature
contents.comment: Wastewater temperature measured.

contents.name: tic
contents.comment: Total Inorganic Carbon concentration measured in the influent or effluent.

contents.name: tn
contents.comment: Total Nitrogen concentration measured in wastewater.

contents.name: toc
contents.comment: Total Organic Carbon concentration measured in the influent or effluent.

contents.name: tss
contents.comment: total suspended solids concentration measured in a tank.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
